title: Apple Scraps EVs, Google’s Problematic AI, and the SEC’s OpenAI Investigation
summary:
Warning: there are already fake AI-generated versions of Kara's book on Amazon. Plus, Kara and Scott discuss Mitch McConnell’s retirement, and the SEC investigation into whether OpenAI’s investors were misled. They also talk about Apple scrapping its almost decade-long plan to release an electric vehicle, and the controversy around Google's Gemini image generation tool. Then, a listener question on what AI can do for HR departments.

Follow us on Instagram and Threads at @pivotpodcastofficial.
